name: Fluffy Inu
description: Fluffy Inu ($FLUFFY) has one of the best tokenomics in the game made to revolutionize and ensure maximum growth on the Ethereum Network. What makes Fluffy Inu special is that we have incorporated a true burn mechanism which is written in the contract, which enables $FLUFFY to constantly acquire tokens leading to the growth of the token. An increase in token price will reflect every time this occurs.
